empty_quiet_ladybug_pull: Automatically translate missing content into the following languages:
jumpy_wise_skate_greet: Use this image for all missing languages:
mealy_lazy_wallaby_boil:
Choose the language for the product details. This selection
                determines the language in which you will input all product
                information, such as the name, description, and other details.
                Make sure to select the correct language to ensure accurate
                translations.
noisy_ideal_hyena_affirm:
Enter the name of the product in the selected language. The
                title should be clear, concise, and accurately represent the
                product. This will be displayed to users in this specific
                language.
curly_slimy_lobster_evoke:
Provide a detailed description of the product in the selected
                language. Include key features, benefits, and any other relevant
                information that will help users understand the product.
spicy_mad_warbler_attend:
Shows missing translations and generates them automatically when
                pressed.
clear_front_jackdaw_skip:
The collection name is not visible to users, but it ensures that
                products whit same collection name are displayed together when
                shown to users.
tangy_active_anaconda_glow:
Select the attribute type you wish to add to the product. Choose
                from options like Dropdown, Checkbox, Button Group, or Color to
                define product variations such as size, color, material, style,
                pattern, or other customizable options.
arable_neat_donkey_inspire: Select and upload product images. You can choose to use the same image across all languages or upload different images for each language if the visuals need to reflect localized content. This flexibility ensures your product is accurately represented in all markets.
icy_tough_falcon_pray: Use this button to apply the selected image to all languages. This is useful when the image does not need localization and can remain consistent across all language versions of the product.
